excerpt: Spicy and savory cauliflower wings, perfect for snacking
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, plant-based milk, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper to make the batter.
Dip each cauliflower floret into the batter to coat completely and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown and crispy.
In a small bowl, mix together the melted vegan butter and hot sauce.
Coat each baked cauliflower wing in the hot sauce mixture and place back on the baking sheet.
Bake for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the wings are crispy and browned.
Serve hot with your favorite vegan dipping sauce.
